About Us

About Us

Vision

To be able to reach most of our friends in our school and to be one of the first clubs that come to mind when it comes to club in our university, since the field of economy and finance is highly appealing.

Collaborating with clubs of other universities in similar areas, organizing events in the style of economy and finance week, and benefiting our friends' networks.

Mission

To raise the awareness of our fellow students at Ibn Haldun University in the fields of economics and finance such as Islamic Economics and Finance, Investment and Blockchain, and to provide them with the skills they can use in their education and life after graduation.

1) To raise awareness of our friends about the most popular, curious, and interesting economy and finance issues of our time

2) Seminars and workshops we will hold on these topics

3) Our biggest goal is to introduce the most prominent names of these sectors to our friends and to provide them with experience share.
